project.name: mini-pages
project.description: A simple client-side router for Meteor

PageRouter.name: PageRouter
PageRouter.description:
The main mini-pages class. Manages creating pages, rendering and 
responding to url path changes. You can only create one PageRouter instance.

props.name: autoRender
props.description:
Set `false` to render manually 
 (i.e. when you use the {{renderPage}} Handlebars helper

props.name: autoStart
props.description:
Set to `false` to manually decide 
 when to listen for url change events.

PageRouter.Page.name: PageRouter.Page
PageRouter.Page.description: Stores information about a specific route.

classitems.name: pages

params.name: pages
params.description:
An object of page definitions where the key is a
 url path and the values are options to the 
 {{#crossLink "PageRouter.Page"}}{{/crossLink}} constructor.
